vent.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a hole or pipe through which gases, liquid etc can enter or escape from an enclosed space or container
vent.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a thin straight opening at the bottom of the back or side of a jacket or coat
vent.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the small hole through which small animals, birds, fish etc pass waste matter out of their bodies
vent.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to express feelings of anger, hatred etc, especially by doing something violent or harmful
vent.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The meeting gave us a chance to vent our spleen  (=anger).
